sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE161080 SET CVRG_INSC_USE_AMT = #cvrgInscUseAmt# , DSBR_EU_CVRG_USE_AMT = #dsbrEuCvrgUseAmt# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

UPDATE YE161080 SET SCXPS_PRS_USE_AMT = #scxpsPrsUseAmt# , SCXPS_DSBR_USE_AMT = #scxpsDsbrUseAmt# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#

WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

UPDATE YE161080 SET D219 = #d219# , PRCSP_WORK_INCM_SUMT_YN = #prcspWorkIncmSumtYn# , CD225 = #cd225# , CD226 = #cd226# , CD227 = #cd227# , CD228 = #cd228# , INCM_DDUC_WTNNTE_SUMT_DT = #incmDducWtnnteSumtDt# , FILE_APP_PAPR_SBT_YN = #fileAppPaprSbtYn# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#

SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.FRGR_LBRR_ENTC_PUP_CD , AA.FRGR_LBRR_LBR_OFR_DT , AA.FRGR_LBRR_RE_EXRY_DT , AA.FRGR_LBRR_RE_RCPN_DT , AA.FRGR_LBRR_RE_ALFA_SBMS_DT , AA.FRGR_LBRR_ERIN_IMN_RCPN_DT , AA.FRGR_LBRR_ERIN_IMN_SBMS_DT , AA.YUP_SNMC_RE_STRT_DT , AA.YUP_SNMC_RE_END_DT , AA.OVRS_SURC_INC_FMT , AA.FRGN_PMT_FC_TXAMT , AA.FRGN_PMT_WC_TXAMT , AA.FRGN_PMT_TXAMT_TXP_NTN_NM , AA.FRGN_PMT_TXAMT_PMT_DT , AA.FRGN_PMT_TXAMT_ALFA_SBMS_DT , AA.FRGN_PMT_TXAMT_ABRD_WKAR_NM , AA.FRGN_DTY_TERM_STDT , AA.FRGN_DTY_TERM_EDDT , AA.FRGN_PMT_TXAMT_RFO_NM , AA.HSNG_TENN_LNPB_USE_AMT , AA.HSNG_TENN_LNPB_DDC_AMT , AA.MMR_USE_AMT , (SELECT NVL(YETA_C156,0) FROM YE169010 C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND C.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND C.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND C.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#) AS MMR_DDC_AMT , AA.TXLG_ITCT_AMNT , AA.TXLG_BSTA_AMNT , AA.TXLG_WKTA_AMNT , AA.TXLG_CLTA_AMNT , AA.TXLG_FRTA_AMNT , AA.TXLG_TXTY_AMNT , BB.YETA_C114 , BB.YETA_C115 , BB.YETA_C116 , BB.YETA_C117
FROM YE161080 AA , YE169010 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
AND AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY

SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , D219 , PRCSP_WORK_INCM_SUMT_YN , CD225 , CD226 , CD227 , CD228 , INCM_DDUC_WTNNTE_SUMT_DT , FILE_APP_PAPR_SBT_YN FROM YE161080 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
